title: typeface to accompany Din: suggestions requested
content: Would you share your suggestions for a typeface to use with Din? Din is being used for the titles (mandatory) and I need something friendly but 'masculine' for small amounts of accompanying text (2-3 lines). What do you think?
author: Bundlebrat

comments.content: Eureka seems like a good sugestion, thanks. But, I used Din. Thanks for confirming that impulse.
